title: German magazine font ID
content:
From German architecture magazine "Velux". Many thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822195513im_/http:/typophile.com/files/velux%20type_6329.PNG)
author: lucadelcarlo

comments.content: You [already](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822195513/http:/typophile.com/node/103100) asked for an ID of the same typeface from the same magazine (even using a sample from the same article) quite recently. Don’t you remember? As [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822195513/http:/www.velux.de/de-DE/Documents/PDF/Architektur/Magazin_Daylight_and_Architecture/07_Velux_Daylight_Winter_2007.pdf) PDF confirms, it’s still Adobe Garamond.
Apologies – the intervening 7 weeks since the last ID have been an upheaval. Sincerely appreciate the previous assistance, as always.
No worries, I was just wondering.
